column4: hi; I installed Ubuntu 10.04 and am now trying to get colinux to boot it (on windows)
COLinux is not like that, it's a Linux that runs inside windows, it does not boot real installs
it does; i'd link you but I don't want to start anything
Well, I just based my answer on what I saw on andLinux page (A ubuntu distro made to work inside windows, it says it's based on COLinux)
